FuncDef:
The bier pipe-mode ttl command sets the TTL processing mode to Pipe in the BIER scenario and specifies the TTL value in Pipe mode.
The undo bier pipe-mode ttl command restores the default TTL processing mode in the BIER scenario.
By default, the TTL processing mode in the BIER scenario is uniform.

ParaDef.Info:
Designated time to live.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the BIER scenario, users can use command to set the TTL processing mode to Pipe and specifies the TTL value in Pipe mode.
